markdownRemark.html:
I have another VIA mainboard ( EN12000EG ) which I'm trying out various drivers for - the openchrome driver works fine with 3D, which is very nice and seems to work OK with XvWC.

Also, I had a thought about the panel mode with P4M900 and openchrome - maybe if I use the VGA out, it will work better?

frontmatter.title: VIA VT3314 and Unichrome Pro IGP
